name: Landing page for a cargo transportation company.
description:
Landing page for a cargo transportation company.


The mission of the GRUZI.ru company is to provide users with a service that will help them solve daily tasks related to the implementation of logistics activities. Only by uniting all participants on one platform is the implementation of logistics automation possible.


It was for these purposes that the Landing Page was created.

I have visualized each product of the platform in clear vector graphics.
